description:
Compete on the go with F1 2011™!
The official game of FORMULA ONE
includes all the cars, stars and
circuits from the 2011 season. Go for
motorsport’s ultimate prize across a
full season, enter individual GRAND
PRIX™ races, or get a quick
FORMULA ONE fix with Time Trials
and Challenge mode. Then race
sport’s fastest racing cars in F1
2011’s multiplayer modes including
four player races and an innovative two
vs. two co-op mode.
name: F1 2011™
